views.markdown:
- add compatibility for iOS 10 and 11 - add ability to change volume adjust (relative volume) for songs
- fixes for iOS 6 and international locales (for start/stop times)
- fix bug where edited fields would reset after scrolling away from and back to field

- add ability to change start/stop times of songs - fix bug where the switches for "Only change Artist/Album/Genre for current song" were ignored - add ability to turn explicit tag on or off
- add ability to move content from music library to podcasts or audiobooks
- minor fixes for iOS 9
- partial fix for duplicate genre bug
- bugfix for iOS 6
- can now edit album year and track number

- album artwork visible in iOS 8.4

- fixes for iOS 8.4

- Fix crash on launch from last update
- App works on iOS 8.3 and lower, not yet 8.4

- fix crash on start in iOS 8.3

added ability to change song genre
